scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FLASK,NODE,FRONTEND,OPEN" -c "blue,green,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:flask" "npm run dev:node" "npm run dev:frontend" "sh -c 'npx wait-on tcp:5000 tcp:8080 http://localhost:5173 && npx open-cli http://localhost:5173'"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mcp-client && npm install && cd ../Frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend:soft: cd Frontend && npm run lint || echo '⚠️ Frontend lint failed (non-blocking)'
scripts.test:stack: npm run test:python:imports && npm run test:python:flask && npm run test:frontend:soft && npm run test:node-cors
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && npm run sync-env && npm run test:stack
scripts.demo: npm run kill-ports && npm run setup && npm run dev
